name: Robots.txt
description: Manage the robots.txt file. Standard for controlling web crawler access to your site.

ROBOTSTXT_COMMUNITY_LISTS.help: Select community-maintained lists to include in robots.txt.
ROBOTSTXT_COMMUNITY_LISTS.label: Community robots.txt lists

multiselect.label: This list contains AI-related crawlers of all types, regardless of purpose.
The RobotsDisallowed project is a harvest of the robots.txt disallowed directories of the world's top websites - specifically those of the Alexa 100K and the Majestic 100K.

ROBOTSTXT_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing robots.txt rules. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
ROBOTSTXT_URLS.label: Robots.txt URLs

ROBOTSTXT_SITEMAP.help: Sitemap URL(s) to include in robots.txt.
ROBOTSTXT_SITEMAP.label: Robots.txt sitemap

ROBOTSTXT_IGNORE_RULES.help: Rule (PCRE regex) to ignore. Can be specified multiple times.
ROBOTSTXT_IGNORE_RULES.label: Ignore rule

ROBOTSTXT_DARKVISITORS_TOKEN.help: Bearer token for the DarkVisitors API.
ROBOTSTXT_DARKVISITORS_TOKEN.label: DarkVisitors API Token

ROBOTSTXT_DARKVISITORS_AGENT_TYPES.help: Comma-separated list of agent types to include in the DarkVisitors agent_types field when contacting the DarkVisitors API.
ROBOTSTXT_DARKVISITORS_AGENT_TYPES.label: DarkVisitors Agent Types

ROBOTSTXT_DARKVISITORS_DISALLOW.help: A string specifying which URLs are disallowed. This value will be sent as the disallow field when contacting the DarkVisitors API.
ROBOTSTXT_DARKVISITORS_DISALLOW.label: DarkVisitors Disallow
